content:
From: Michal Wallace <michal.wallace@gmail.com>
I've found at least two interesting things supposedly formalized in
isabelle that I would really love to have access to, but the *.thy files
are nowhere to be found.

  • "The 5 Colour Theorem in Isabelle/Isar" by Gertrud Bauer and Tobias Nipkow

http://wwwbroy.in.tum.de/publ/papers/5colour.pdf

  • "Mechanising Hilbert's _Foundations of Geometry_ in Isabelle" by Phil
    Scott

https://www.inf.ed.ac.uk/publications/thesis/online/IM080566.pdf

Anyone know where to find these files?

Is there any chance we might be able to get them into the AFP?

From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
On 26/08/2018 04:50, Michal Wallace wrote:

I've found at least two interesting things supposedly formalized in
isabelle that I would really love to have access to, but the *.thy files
are nowhere to be found.

  • "The 5 Colour Theorem in Isabelle/Isar" by Gertrud Bauer and Tobias Nipkow

As far as I know, these files are lost. In retrospect I would not recommend
going that way. It was rather complicated.

Tobias

http://wwwbroy.in.tum.de/publ/papers/5colour.pdf

  • "Mechanising Hilbert's _Foundations of Geometry_ in Isabelle" by Phil
    Scott

https://www.inf.ed.ac.uk/publications/thesis/online/IM080566.pdf

Anyone know where to find these files?

Is there any chance we might be able to get them into the AFP?

smime.p7s
